TopicTitle: Has Flying Tiger Entertainment been fired, or are these just rumors that have started

Articles.Content: https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/5dufk4/flying_tiger_fired_from_ksp/?ref=share&ref_source=link. Someone on reddit called FTE and the said they aren't working on ksp anymore
its been floating aroud here to.  no official word has been givin.  i would imagine this is a complete headache for squad as it seems they hired fte to do a job and they just blew it.

Two threads on reddit, pointing to each other... “there's another independent thread about it, so it must be true!"

Not saying these are blatant lies... in fact,  it would make sense (apart from Squad actually taking action), but the proof of it is thin.

It appears that the reddit post this is linking to has been deleted, so I'm going to go ahead and close this. I would recommend if you have any questions on this subject, it would probably be best to contact @Badie and/or @UomoCapra.
